mapper.update: UPDATE /* com.at.apcss.fm.fclt.mapper.FcltOgnzPrcsPrfmncMapper.deleteFcltOgnzPrcsPrfmnc */ TB_FCLT_OGNZ_PRCS_PRFMNC FCLT SET DEL_YN = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND TRGT_YR = #{trgtYr} AND APC_CD = #{apcCd}
mapper.select:
SELECT /* com.at.apcss.fm.fclt.mapper.FcltOgnzPrcsPrfmncMapper.selectFcltOgnzPrcsPrfmncRawDataList */ OTI.CRTR_YR , OTI.APC_CD ,(SELECT APC_NM FROM TB_APC_INFO WHERE APC_CD = OTI.APC_CD) AS APC_NM
, (SELECT FN_GET_COM_CD_VL_NM('UNTY_CTPV',CTPV_CD) FROM TB_TE_APC_OPER_PRSN_OTLN WHERE 1=1 AND APC_CD = OTI.APC_CD AND CRTR_YR = OTI.CRTR_YR ) AS CTPV_NM
, (SELECT X.CD_VL_EXPLN FROM TB_COM_CD_DTL X WHERE 1=1 AND X.CD_ID = 'UNTY_SGG' AND X.APC_CD = '0000' AND X.CD_VL = (SELECT SIGUN_CD FROM TB_TE_APC_OPER_PRSN_OTLN WHERE 1=1 AND APC_CD = OTI.APC_CD AND CRTR_YR = OTI.CRTR_YR) ) AS SIGUN_NM
, OTI.SN , OTI.ITEM_CD , OTI.ITEM_NM
, OPD.RTL_OGNZ_TOT_TRMT_AMT , OPD.RTL_OGNZ_TOT_TRMT_VLM , OPD.RTL_OGNZ_GNRL_SUM , OPD.RTL_OGNZ_GNRL_SMPL_TRST , OPD.RTL_OGNZ_GNRL_SMPL_EMSPAP , OPD.RTL_OGNZ_OGNZ_SUM , OPD.RTL_OGNZ_OGNZ_CPRTN_SORT_TRST , OPD.RTL_OGNZ_OGNZ_CTRT_EMSPAP
FROM TB_TE_APC_OPER_TRMT_ITEM OTI ,TB_TE_APC_OPER_PRFMNC_DTL OPD WHERE 1=1 AND OTI.APC_CD = OPD.APC_CD(+) AND OTI.CRTR_YR = OPD.CRTR_YR(+) AND OTI.SN = OPD.SN(+) AND OTI.OGNZ_SE_CD = '1' AND OTI.APC_CD IS NOT NULL
AND OTI.CRTR_YR = #{crtrYr}
AND OTI.APC_CD IN (SELECT APC_CD FROM TB_APC_INFO WHERE 1=1
AND CTPV = (SELECT CTPV FROM TB_COM_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId})
AND SGG = (SELECT SGG FROM TB_COM_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId})
)
ORDER BY OTI.CRTR_YR , APC_NM , OTI.SN
